attributes.action: give more formal guidance on the role of the politician's, MP's wives and first ladies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who do we actually elect ? The party, a govt. individuals or their families ? This opinion is peacefully expressed, neither designed nor intended to cause offence to anyone, but the civil list, expense accounts and jobs for the boys simply makes me sick in a democracy with an equitable constitution. The petitioner is calling on the PM. to consider paying everyone the a baseline rate of salary, rather than hourly miniumum pay, even, I feel so strongly about equality.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
